author: David Schanzer, opinion contributor
title: Coronavirus: Your government failed you
description: Following 9/11, White House counterterrorism advisor Richard Clarke told the nation that: “Your government failed you,” but the Trump administration’s performance on COVID-19 has been far, far worse than the intelligence community’s failure to prevent 9/11.
content: As the carnage from COVID-19 in the United States continues to mount at the unthinkable rate of 2,000 deaths per day and with unemployment possibly reaching 32 percent, the evidence now demonstrates without a shadow of a doubt that the United States governmen… [+5777 chars]
